sentences.sentence: Patrick Bouvier, born prematurely on August 7, 1963, died two days later.
sentences.translation: 帕奇科·鲍威尔于1963年8月7日早产，两天后死去。

sentences.sentence: She was born Jacqueline Lee Bouvier, daughter of John Vernon Bouvier III and his wife, Janet Lee.
sentences.translation: 她的闺名是杰奎琳李鲍威尔，约翰弗农鲍威尔三世和他的妻子，珍妮特李的女儿。

sentences.sentence: John F. Kennedy and Jackie Bouvier were married in Newport, Rhode Island and their son married on an island in Georgia.
sentences.translation: 约翰·肯尼迪与杰姬·布维耶在美国罗德岛州的新港完婚，他们的儿子则在乔治亚州的一个岛屿上结婚；
